twitch_info.title: The best it's gonna get
twitch_info.description: 50 damn hp. This boss has broken me, I just can't stand to grind against the RNG wall in hopes it'll let me through to the one attack I've yet to conquer. If I could go back and use Angel mode, I would, but I'm stuck here, unable to go back to the map. So sadly, this is the best it's gonna get.
